content.description: Start on the starting hold of "long stuff" and the right hand starting hold of "short stuff" and traverse your way across to the left side arete and top out. The crux(ish) area is getting around to the arete. Aside from that awesome feet.
content.location: Start on the starting hold of "long stuff" and the right hand starting hold of "short stuff" and traverse your way across to the left side arete and top out.

content.description:
Start on the biggest rail, with a heel on the lower rail. Pull up and use the crimps to climb up the boulder. 

  This is a canyon classic, with great holds and an easy top out. This is the climb you take the newbies to.
content.location: Straight up from the two huge rails in the middle of the face.

content.description: Start matched in the small sloping hole with a heel on the large rail to the left on the start of "Short Stuff" make a difficult move to a sloping crimp pinch, climb up and right to an awkward topout.
content.location:
4' right of Short stuff 

  Start on small sloping hole and climb right and up. 

  Same walk off as short stuff(left and over the boulder)

content.description:
As you walk up the path at the base of the ravine passing Johnny boulder you find yourself between the Dungeon Boulder(on left) and Short Stuff Boulder(on right) with obvious low rails stacked on top of each other. 

  This boulder offers one of the easiest climbs in the canyon that is a regular warm up "Short Stuff"
